description: Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, heir to the Saudi throne, who is leading a crackdown on corruption by the Saudi elite, bought the lavish Château Louis XIV.
title: A Chateau Fit for a Crown Prince
title_page: A Chateau Fit for a Crown Prince - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 9,
The Château Louis XIV was built by the developer Emad Khashoggi using traditional craftsmanship techniques and materials. Several of the ceilings in the reception halls and master suites depict themes that were dear to Louis XIV, and which are also often seen in the Château de Versailles.
